TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 定义协定以实现自定义会话状态容器。

span.span: Defines the contract to implement a custom session-state container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态容器提供了对会话状态的值和当前会话的相关的信息的访问。A session-state container provides access to the session-state values and related information for the current session. 向应用程序代码中通过公开会话状态容器中包含的会话信息类使用属性。Session information included in a session-state container is exposed to application code through the class using the property. 类是用于会话状态容器的包装器类。The class is a wrapper class for a session-state container. 会话状态容器的 ASP.NET 实现是类。The ASP.NET implementation of a session-state container is the class. 请求的开始处期间事件，创建并填充对象，并将其分配给当前。At the beginning of a request, during the event, the creates and populates an object and assigns it to the current . 请求结束时期间事件，检索对象从当前并执行任何所需的会话工作，例如会话值写入会话存储区，或放弃会话。At the end of a request, during the event, the retrieves the object from the current and performs any required session work, such as writing the session values to the session store, or abandoning the session. 如果该请求将突然终止，此类通过重定向，如通过调用执行相同的清理方法。If the request is abruptly terminated, such as through a redirect, the performs the same cleanup by calling the method. 若要创建自定义会话状态容器，请创建一个实现类接口。To create a custom session-state container, create a class that implements the interface. 如果您正在创建你自己的自定义会话状态容器，还必须将为与自定义模块。If you are creating your own custom session-state container, you must also replace the with your own custom module. 自定义模块将创建的自定义会话状态容器实例，并将其添加到当前使用方法。Your custom module will create an instance of your custom session-state container and add it to the current using the method. 自定义会话状态模块的示例包含在类概述。An example of a custom session-state module is included in the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现接口，以创建一个名为的新会话状态容器类`MySessionState`。The following code example implements the interface to create a new session-state container class named `MySessionState`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon() cil managed

summary.span: 结束当前会话。

span.span: Ends the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于清除会话数据和引发**Session_OnEnd**在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件。The method is used to clear out session data and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现方法的接口。The following code example implements the method of the interface. 代码示例重复项的行为类，因为它将添加属性设置为`true`时调用方法。The code example duplicates the behavior of the class in that it adds an property that is set to `true` when the method is called. 属性检查期间的会话状态模块事件以确定是否已放弃该会话，会话状态模块清除会话数据和执行**Session_OnEnd**事件。The property is checked by the session-state module during the event to determine whether the session has been abandoned, and the session-state module clears out session data and executes the **Session_OnEnd** event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#8)]

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CodePage : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的代码页标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the code-page identifier for the current session.

value.span: 当前会话的代码页标识符。

span.span: The code-page identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符集 （代码页） 用于解释多字节字符数据，确定的字符值，并因此排序顺序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multi-byte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 代码页设置仅适用于多字节字符数据，不为 Unicode 字符数据。Code-page settings apply only to multi-byte character data, not to Unicode character data. 这属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性的属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property of the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现属性的接口来获取和设置当前响应的编码。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the encoding for the current response. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否为无 Cookie 会话配置应用程序。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.

value.span: 指示是否为无 Cookie 会话配置应用程序的其中一个 值。

span.span: One of the values that indicate whether the application is configured for cookieless sessions.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回枚举值为基础的值，该值`cookieless`属性的配置元素。The property returns a enumeration value that is based on the value of the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element. 如果`cookieless`属性设置为`true`，然后属性将返回; 否则为属性将返回。If the `cookieless` attribute is set to `true`, then the property returns ; otherwise, the property returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`cookieless`的属性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)元素`true`在 Web.config 文件以更改属性。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element to `true` in the Web.config file to change the property. 对于此示例应用程序配置中，属性返回。For this sample application configuration, the property would return . ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置当前会话的区域设置标识符 (LCID)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`LCID`属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。This `LCID` property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不在会话状态中存储的区域设置标识符。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 属性调用获取和设置的标识符。The property calls the to get and set the identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现属性的接口来获取和设置当前页的区域设置标识符。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the locale identifier for the current page. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Timeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取并设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的超时期限（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: Gets and sets the time-out period (in minutes) allowed between requests before the session-state provider terminates the session.

value.span: 超时时间（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time-out period, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现属性的接口来获取和设置存储在类构造函数中创建一个内部变量的会话超时值。The following code example implements the property of the interface to get and set the session timeout value that is stored in an internal variable created in the class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/CS/mysessionstate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState/VB/mysessionstate.vb#2)]
